targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by(instance, le, path, code) (rate(greptime_servers_grpc_requests_elapsed_bucket{instance=~"$instance"}[$__rate_interval])))
histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by(instance, le, path, method, code) (rate(greptime_servers_http_requests_elapsed_bucket{instance=~"$instance",path!~"/health|/metrics"}[$__rate_interval])))
histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by(instance, le, subprotocol, db) (rate(greptime_servers_mysql_query_elapsed_bucket{instance=~"$instance"}[$__rate_interval])))
histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by(instance, le, subprotocol, db) (rate(greptime_servers_postgres_query_elapsed_bucket{instance=~"$instance"}[$__rate_interval])))

panels.title: HTTP prom store write per DB
HTTP prom store read per DB

targets.expr: label_replace(histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by(instance, le, db, type, code) (rate(greptime_servers_grpc_db_request_elapsed_bucket{instance=~"$instance"}[$__rate_interval]))), "db", "$1", "db", "(.*)-public")

sum(increase(greptime_mito_cache_hit[$__rate_interval])) by (instance, type) / (sum(increase(greptime_mito_cache_miss[$__rate_interval])) by (instance, type) + sum(increase(greptime_mito_cache_hit[$__rate_interval])) by (instance, type))
histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by(instance, le, scheme) (rate(opendal_requests_duration_seconds_bucket{instance=~"$instance", operation="write"}[$__rate_interval])))
histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by(instance, le, scheme) (rate(opendal_requests_duration_seconds_bucket{instance=~"$instance", operation="list"}[$__rate_interval])))
histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by(instance, le, scheme) (rate(opendal_requests_duration_seconds_bucket{instance=~"$instance", operation="stat"}[$__rate_interval])))
histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by(instance, le, scheme, operation) (rate(opendal_requests_duration_seconds_bucket{instance=~"$instance", operation!~"read|write|list"}[$__rate_interval])))
histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by(instance, le, scheme, operation) (rate(opendal_bytes_total_bucket{instance=~"$instance"}[$__rate_interval])))
